Transferred_Post:
"I can't help but feel a mix of anger and sadness when I see pregnant women smoking. It's just so irresponsible and selfish! The baby has no say in the matter and ultimately, it's the one who suffers. Explanation:

* In the original post, the author attributes the pregnant women's smoking behavior to their irresponsibility and selfishness (internal attribution).
* In the transferred post, the author attributes the behavior to the external factor of addiction and the difficulty of quitting smoking (external attribution).
